snippet: In a seven-page response filed in San Francisco Superior Court late Wednesday, Kleiner Perkins took an expectedly aggressive stance to charges that it retaliated against a female partner.
abstract: In a seven-page response filed in San Francisco Superior Court late Wednesday, Kleiner Perkins took an expectedly aggressive stance to charges that it retaliated against a female partner.

headline.main: Venture Firm Fires Back in Discrimination Case
headline.print_headline: Kleiner Perkins Denies Sex Bias in Response to a Lawsuit
